Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m2 ) 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive , screen . Have body weight 40.0 kg high Cohorts 1 , 2 , 3 4 , 48.0 kg high Cohort 5 .
